meanings.definition: A plant of the cabbage family, including broccoli, Brussels sprouts, and kale.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat crucifers like broccoli and kale for their health benefits.
meanings.sent2: Farmers grow crucifers such as Brussels sprouts in the cool season.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cabbage refuse to hang out with the other crucifers? It wanted to be the head of the bunch!
meanings.sent4: The garden looked like a colorful painting with the vibrant crucifers swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret to a delicious salad was the addition of fresh crucifers.
